name: Outlaw Tales: Survival Online
summary: Welcome to Outlaw Tales stranger. You are about to start your story as an outlaw. How the life of your character will develop depends on you. - Do you want to be the outlaw most wanted by law? In Outlaw you can! You can walk the path of dishonor, join a gang of thieves, shoot the outlaws in the back before they challenge you to a duel, steal a poor old man who only asks for help ... - Do you prefer to help the law and dress the silver star? Do not hesitate to help the sheriff when he asks for it. There are many characters that will need your help in the vast and hard west. Be an example to follow! -Want to have fun and seek to be in the top positions of the ranking? This is Outlaw. The events have a touch of personal humor and uniquely prepared by our writers. Enjoy finding out what happens behind each response, you will not regret it, or, investigate and try to advance within each story. There are surprises that only the most astute can discover.
